appbar.tooltipToggleTheme: Toggle between light and dark theme

general.privacyNotificationOn: Privacy mode is activated. Absolute numbers are hidden.
general.privacyNotificationOff: Privacy mode is deactivated. Absolute numbers are visible.

landingPage.welcome: Keep your monthly budget in check!
landingPage.introText: Upgrade from your Excel sheet and use Financegoras to collect your income, expenses and savings in one place. Spot trends and opportunities for optimization using the different visualizations.
landingPage.dashboardImageText: After logging in, creating your custom categories and adding your first transactions, you can overview your budget book and the visualizations. Start by adding your salary, rent and subscriptions. Then, add your daily expenses and see how your budget evolves over time.
landingPage.dataSecurityText: Your transactions are stored in our database together with your hashed user id. We do not store any data that could be used to identify you, besides what you enter as transaction data. Authentication is done via OAuth Applications and no login or account data is stored by us.

budgetPage.name: Name
budgetPage.feedbackAddTransactionSuccessMessage: The transaction has been added to your budget book.
budgetPage.feedbackAddTransactionErrorMessage: An error occurred while adding the transaction.
budgetPage.feedbackUpdateTransactionSuccessMessage: The transaction has been updated successfully.
budgetPage.feedbackUpdateTransactionErrorMessage: An error occurred while updating the transaction.
budgetPage.feedbackDeleteTransactionSuccessMessage: The transaction has been deleted successfully.
budgetPage.feedbackDeleteTransactionErrorMessage: An error occurred while deleting the transaction.
budgetPage.feedbackAddGroupErrorMessage: Please choose a unique name. It must not be empty.
budgetPage.feedbackUpdateBackendSuccessMessage: The changes have been saved successfully on the server.
budgetPage.feedbackUpdateBackendErrorMessage: An error occurred while saving the changes.
budgetPage.deleteModalGroupText1: Do you really want to delete the following group?
budgetPage.deleteModalGroupText2: This will also delete the contained categories:
budgetPage.deleteModalGroupText3: Already created transactions and their categories will not be affected.
budgetPage.groupedTooltip: Aggregates all categories by their group
budgetPage.percentageTooltip: Scales the bar and line chart to 100%
budgetPage.includeEmptyCategoriesTooltip: Includes all categories that you have used in the past, even if they are not used this month for better comparison

analysisPage.onlyExpenses: Only include expenses in graph and tables
